messages.content: ComfyUI_NetDist allows running ComfyUI workflows on multiple local GPUs/networked machines.
What is the required external library for ComfyUI_NetDist?
The single requirement for ComfyUI_NetDist is the 'requests' library.
To install ComfyUI_NetDist, clone the repository into the custom nodes folder by running `git clone https://github.com/city96/ComfyUI_NetDist ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ComfyUI_NetDist`
How can I use ComfyUI_NetDist for dual-GPU setups?

To use ComfyUI_NetDist with two different GPUs or two separate PCs, you must have at least two separate ComfyUI instances and specify different launch arguments such as `--port [port]` and `--cuda-device [number]`. For example, you could use `--port 8288 --cuda-device 1`. If you're running your second instance on a different PC, add `--listen` to your launch arguments and set the correct remote IP.
Can ComfyUI_NetDist handle multiple separate image output nodes?
Yes, ComfyUI_NetDist can handle multiple separate image output nodes, but support for this feature is on the roadmap.
